block.p: * Craig Simpson, chairman and chief executive of McCann-Erickson Canada, will move to New York to work on the Coca-Cola Co. account at McCann-Erickson, New York. A spokeswoman for McCann confirmed a report about Mr. Simpson in this week's issue of the trade publication Advertising Age, but added that no other information would be available. * Alan Burgis, senior vice president, has been promoted to director of client services at McCann-Erickson, Los Angeles, from management representative.
